verbs.description: It [V: appears] [ARG1: Democratic leaders in Congress were left off the guest list for President Donald Trump 's first state dinner at the White House on Tuesday] .
It appears Democratic leaders in Congress [V: were] left off the guest list for President Donald Trump 's first state dinner at the White House on Tuesday .
It appears [ARG1: Democratic leaders in Congress] were [V: left] [ARG2: off the guest list for President Donald Trump 's first state dinner at the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] .
